thai: sà-wàt-dii khráp khun phâaw khun mâae.
sà-wàt-dii khráp khun jeem. sà-baai dii mǎi khráp.
sà-baai dii khráp. láaeo khun phâaw gàp khun mâae lâ khráp.
english: I'm fine. And you, dad and mom?

thai: khun jeem nîi ní-chaa lûuk-sǎao khǎawng phǒm khráp.
english: James, this is Nicha, my daughter.

thai: sà-wàt-dii khâ. yin-dii thîi dâai rúu-jàk khâ.
sà-wàt-dii khráp. yin-dii thîi dâai rúu-jàk chên gan khráp.
english: Hello. Nice to meet you, too.

thai: chûuai thǔue grà-bpǎo mǎi khá. óoi... grà-bpǎo bai níi nàk mâak.
english: Shall I help carry the bags? Oh, this bag is so heavy!

thai: mâi bpen rai khráp. phǒm thǔue eeng dâai khráp. rót yùu thîi-nǎi khráp.
english: Don't worry about it. I can carry it myself. Where is the car?
Uh...the car is way over there.

thai: roong-riian khǎawng phǒm khuue dtùek nóon
english: My school is that building over there.
